title: [Client]  Illaoi's Champion Photo is missing from the client
body:
Illaoi's Champion Photo is missing and only shows a black bar in the client when you first start the client.  It appears on the screen with the "Launch" button, as pictured in the link attached.

Bug reproduces 100% of the times that I tried and with no special requirements or circumstances for reproducing.

replies.body:
Hey Sona Ping,

Thanks for the report! We'll see what's going on here!

Same thing is happening to me. Used to happen for all new champions that came out after Bard, then I uninstalled and reinstalled, hoping it would fix the issue. I thought it did, until Illaoi went on free week rotation and I started noticing it again.
